name: Slice Mania: Cooking Game
description:
Touch the screen at precisely the right moment, as prompted by the slice line, and earn coins and experience for the next level.

The longest streak of precise slices you achieve, the more coins you will earn.

What level can you get to?

Slice Mania: Cooking Game features:
• Simple, addictive gameplay that will make you feel like a chef
• Many different knives that will keep you slicing non-stop
• Colorful art and new ingredients every 3 new levels
